testsuite.name: HonestCalculatorTest
testsuite.system-out: ?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m Enter an equation > 4 * 5.5 22.0 Do you want to store the result? (y / n): > y Do you want to continue calculations? (y / n): > n ?[1;31m Start test 2?[0m Enter an equation > 11 * 11.1 122.1 Do you want to store the result? (y / n): > y Do you want to continue calculations? (y / n): > n ?[1;31m Start test 3?[0m Enter an equation > 1 * 5 You are ... lazy ... very lazy 5.0 Do you want to store the result? (y / n): > y Do you want to continue calculations? (y / n): > y Enter an equation > 0 + M You are ... lazy ... very, very lazy 5.0 Do you want to store the result? (y / n): > y Do you want to continue calculations? (y / n): > n ?[1;31m Start test 4?[0m Enter an equation > 2 / M You are ... lazy Yeah... division by zero. Smart move... Enter an equation > 1 * M You are ... lazy ... very lazy ... very, very lazy 0.0 Do you want to store the result? (y / n): > n Do you want to continue calculations? (y / n): > y Enter an equation > 899 * 0 You are ... very, very lazy 0.0 Do you want to store the result? (y / n): > n Do you want to continue calculations? (y / n): > n
